channel.description: A place where I share my thoughts about programming.

item.title: CTF Time: Compile JPHide on Kali Linux
item.author: mc
item.description: Recently I started participating in CTF (capture the flag) games. One of the challenges that I needed to solve, was to recover a message hidden in a JPEG file. To solve this challenge I needed an old steganography tool called jphide.
